title: Create file conflict detector
description: Implement scripts/conflict-detector.py to detect overlapping files_affected fields across parallel tasks. Classify conflicts as BLOCKING (write-write) or WARNING (read-write). Include pattern matching for file globs and directory overlap detection.
completion_notes: Implemented file conflict detector with pattern matching, operation analysis, conflict classification (BLOCKING/WARNING/INFO), directory overlap detection, and execution order suggestions
notes: Prevents file conflicts between parallel tasks
